ygData.subject: Re: Spell Research
ygData.msgSnippet: WTF!  i tried to make my L20 pet spell and blew it 3 times!  wow, big deal, i increased each time.  and i think i drove people crazy getting the words in the
ygData.messageBody:
WTF! i tried to make my L20 pet spell and blew it 3 times! wow, big deal,
i increased each time. and i think i drove people crazy getting the words
in the first place. ya, and i know i can buy it in the sk guilds. im prob
gonna just do that (cheap bastard).

belphenor
